SV1.why: Canonical design map and anti-singularity principles guiding lens fusion and forgiveness safeguards.
constraints: Maintain decentralized, anti-singularity stance with harmonic damping.
Apply harmonic lens weighting to prevent runaway behaviors.
Honor kenotic forgiveness motifs when dispersion grows.

SV2.why: PhaseCube ethos of influence-overwrite separation and non-collapsing ternary phases.
constraints: Keep inputs as bias only; never overwrite state directly.
Preserve bounded, non-collapsing dynamics with stochastic flips.
Retain plasma/liquid/solid tri-phase framing for interpretability.

SV3.why: Defines PhaseGrid parameters, toroidal neighbors, and damping via ALPHA for stability.
constraints: Use toroidal wrapping for neighbor sampling in the lattice.
Expose tunable probabilities (flip, parity, path branching, damping).
Favor simple, inspectable loops supporting ~4096 agents.

SV4.why: Four-lens framework for weighting behaviors and harmonic fusion strategy.
constraints: Represent human/predictive/systemic/harmonic lenses explicitly.
Blend decisions via harmonic fusion to stabilize other lenses.
Keep modules minimal and extensible for new lenses.

SV5.why: Swarm consensus framing, oracle selection via noise, and gossip/teleport propagation metaphors.
constraints: Favor decentralized updates with noise-derived arbitration (no central controller).
Support witness-style propagation via soft cross-talk rather than direct control.
Allow probabilistic oracle/bias selection seeded by stochastic sources.

SV6.why: Dual-grid dialogue, delay-fed bias, and structural plasticity guardrails.
constraints: Implement soft coupling between grids instead of overwrite.
Include delay-line feedback as temporary memory bias.
Provide tunable plasticity for occasional rewiring without losing locality.

SV7.why: Tri-grid orchestration with interpretability overlays and harmonic safeguards.
constraints: Coordinate core/echo/memory grids with bias feedback not control.
Inject harmonic damping when dispersion spikes.
Keep metrics observable for coherence/divergence without adding goals.

SV8.why: Kenotic N-body forgiveness operator as damping mechanism when dispersion exceeds thresholds.
constraints: Trigger forgiveness factor to reduce coupling when spread crosses threshold.
Retain triadic framing for stability checks.
Log forgiveness events for interpretability and testing.

summary: Implements a lens-aware tri-grid swarm runner with bias/delay feedback, harmonic damping, and tunable plasticity as a CLI-friendly PhaseCube evolution.
